subject: College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football (College)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A.’s meetings failed to address its most corrosive problems: middlemen who sell players, coaches who broker deals with boosters and the abuse in payments for unofficial visits.
snippet: The N.C.A.A.’s meetings failed to address its most corrosive problems: middlemen who sell players, coaches who broker deals with boosters and the abuse in payments for unofficial visits.
